4303480.name: 10-Man Idle
4303480.description:
No microtransactions. No ads. This is a solo developer passion project, and that will never change. I hope you have a blast - even offline.


10-Man Idle is a guild management idle RPG where you recruit, equip, and command a roster of adventurers. Assign heroes to gather resources, craft gear, run dungeons, or tackle epic raids - then watch your guild thrive or return later to find your progress waiting.

Build Your Roster Choose from 11 distinct classes - Warriors, Paladins, Mages, Rogues, Priests, and more - each filling a Tank, Healer, or DPS role. The right composition is key to conquering the toughest content.

Master the Professions Work 11 professions across gathering and crafting. Mine, harvest, fish, then smelt, brew, cook, and enchant your way to powerful gear - each with 8-10 tiers to master.

Conquer Dungeons & Raids Send parties into dangerous dungeons for rare drops and guild experience. When ready, tackle hour-long raids for legendary gear.

Idle Progression That Respects Your Time Your guild works while you're away - up to 8 hours of offline progress. Return to a full inventory and a stronger team.

Deep Equipment & Achievements Hundreds of items across five rarity tiers. Craft them, loot them, or hunt class-specific legendary weapons and armor. A comprehensive achievement system tracks your milestones across every aspect of the game.

Build the ultimate guild - one hero at a time.
